# Kokkos

## Pros

- Vendor agnostic
- Supports many backends
  - Serial
  - OpenMP
  - CUDA
  - HIP
  - SYCL
- Open source
- Conceptually fairly straightforward


## Cons

- C++ only
- Builds for specific targets


## Main concepts

- Memory spaces: place your data
- Execution spaces: execute your code
- Execution pattern: parallel constructs
